titles: Observations upon Mr. Johnson's remarks, upon Dr. Sherlock's book of non-resistance
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to William Sherlock. cf. NUC.
keywords: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703. --  Remarks upon Dr. Sherlock's book, intituled The case of resistance of the supreme powers stated and resolved.
